channel.title: IntelliCraft
channel.description:
[center][URL=http://intelliforums.com/][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Ku6xXvK.png[/img][/URL][/center] [center]____________________________________________________________________________________________[/center]
[b][u]Index:[/u][/b] [ul][li][iurl=#What]What is IntelliCraft?[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#Things]What do we offer?[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#How]How can I join?[/iurl][/li][/ul]
[center]------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/center][anchor=What] [b]What is IntelliCraft?[/b][/anchor] IntelliCraft is a brand new MineCraft server that has a little something for everyone! After playing countless other servers, we found it tiring to see that all the servers generally only offered one or two things and their main priority was to make money off the players. This led the entire server to be simply another play-to-win type server which we see too often already. [center]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/center][anchor=Things][/anchor] [b]What do we offer?[/b] We offer a vanilla Survival world, PvP world, Spleef, Bow Spleef, and Hunger Games. We have custom Hunger Game arenas and a brand new lobby! Our main purpose is to please our players. We thrive on player feedback and suggestions, if players want it, we will make it our priority to attempt to give it to the players! [center]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/center] [anchor=How][b]How can I join?[/b][/anchor] You can join the community by joining our [url=http://intelliforums.com/forum/]forum[/url]. The server IP is mc.intelliforums.com and we hope to see you there soon!

item.title: IntelliCraft
item.dc:creator: @Null_Amount N_A
item.description:
@Null_Amount wrote:

[quote=“asshole_rule, post:3, topic:523996”]pvp server should be fun, but i got on and there was nobody but me.

will look again for players tomorrow.[/quote]
We’ve barely started up. At the moment, we’re attempting to gain a player base. Hopefully there will be more players online at a more constant amount soon!

Read full topic

item.title: IntelliCraft
item.dc:creator: @Null_Amount N_A
item.description:
@Null_Amount wrote:

[center][/center]
[center]____________________________________________________________________________________________[/center]

Index:
[ul][li][iurl=#What]What is IntelliCraft?[/iurl][/li]
[li][iurl=#Things]What do we offer?[/iurl][/li]
[li][iurl=#How]How can I join?[/iurl][/li][/ul]

[center]------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/center][anchor=What]
What is IntelliCraft?[/anchor]
IntelliCraft is a brand new MineCraft server that has a little something for everyone! After playing countless other servers, we found it tiring to see that all the servers generally only offered one or two things and their main priority was to make money off the players. This led the entire server to be simply another play-to-win type server which we see too often already.
[center]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/center][anchor=Things][/anchor]
What do we offer?
We offer a vanilla Survival world, PvP world, Spleef, Bow Spleef, and Hunger Games. We have custom Hunger Game arenas and a brand new lobby! Our main purpose is to please our players. We thrive on player feedback and suggestions, if players want it, we will make it our priority to attempt to give it to the players!
[center]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/center]
[anchor=How]How can I join?[/anchor]
You can join the community by joining our forum. The server IP is mc.intelliforums.com and we hope to see you there soon!

Read full topic
